scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Add, Update, Get and Delete the Child users from the Teacher or Parents Profile. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of Create Complete Teacher or Parent Profile.
scenario.title: Add child user using sps child Service

When.step: I am Calling the Add Child Service End Point

Then.step: I should Get the "Added Child Info" in response.

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Add, Update, Get and Delete the Grade and the Class Size from the Teachers Profile. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of Create Complete Teacher Profile.

I receive the confirmation message

scenario.feature: As a SPS User I want to verify all the lookup services.
scenario.title: Get all schools by zipcode from the lookup Services

Given.step: I am Using SPS Service to Get "All Schools by Zip Code"

When.step: I am Calling Get All Schools by Zip Code Service End Point

Then.step: I should Get all Schools by Zip Code in response.

scenario.feature: As a SPS User I want to verify all the lookup services.
scenario.title: Using lookup services to get all schools by zipcode-7-1

Given.step: SPS Service has been used to call "All schools by Zip Code"

When.step: End Point Zip Code service issued

Then.step: the result should be all schools by Zip Code

scenario.feature: As a SPS User I want to verify all the lookup services.
scenario.title: Using zip code to search all schools which are looking for the services-6-1.

Given.step: A text field to enter a "Zip code"

When.step: I am selecting search button/link of all schools using zip code

Then.step: I must receive a list of schools corresponding to the zip code

scenario.feature: As a SPS User I want to verify all the lookup services.
scenario.title: Get all teachers of a school from the lookup Services

Given.step: I am Using SPS Service to Get "All Teachers"

When.step: I am Calling Get All Teachers Service End Point

Then.step: I should Get all Teachers in response.

scenario.feature: As a SPS User I want to verify all the lookup services.
scenario.title: All school teachers querying service-7-2

Given.step: SPS Service has been used to call "All Teachers"

When.step: I am performing End Point Zip Code service

Then.step: this should return all Teachers

When.step: I am Calling The Capture Payment Service End Point

scenario.title: Grasp payment from the payment Services-10

scenario.title: Add credit card from the subscription Services

When.step: I am Calling Add Credit Card to Subscription Service End Point

scenario.title: Add credit card from the subscription service-5

is enabled for online transactions

Then.step: my card is added

scenario.title: The process of adding credit card from the subscription Services-7

When.step: "Add Credit Card to Subscription Service End Point" called

scenario.feature: As a QA Engineer I want to Add, Edit Credit Cards for Subscription and Capture and Sign in Payments.
scenario.title: Payment services Credit card option

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: Change existing US domestic school to existing international school using sps edit school services

Given.step: I am Using SPS Edit School Service to Change from US Domestic School to "Existing International School"

When.step: I am Calling the Edit Domestic To International School Service End Point

Then.step: I should See the School changed to "International School" in response.

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: changing US domestic school to international school using sps school edit services-5

Given.step: sps school edit services are up and running
I am authentic user to change information in database
I am allowed to view school information in database

When.step: I query school database using sps edit school service

Then.step: school is changed from domestic to international
I see changes applied.

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: The use of sps edit to change available US domestic school to available international school-7

Given.step: that SPS Edit School Service is used to Change from US Domestic School to "Existing International School"

When.step: Edit Domestic To International School Service End Point called

Then.step: the response should be "International School"

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: Alter school information using school profile in the main page-6

Given.step: School profile information

When.step: I am selecting modify link in the main menu of school profile

Then.step: I should get failure or success message of the action after altering information

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: Change existing US domestic school to home School using sps edit school services

Given.step: I am Using SPS Edit School Service to Change from US Domestic School to "Home School"

When.step: I am Calling the Edit Domestic To Home School Service End Point

Then.step: I should See the School changed to "Home School" in response.

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: Replace current US domestic school to home School utilizing sps edit school services-10

Given.step: US Domestic Schools are replaced by "Home School" by utilizing SPS Edit School Service

When.step: the Edit Domestic To Home School Service End Point is invoked

Then.step: the School are replaced by "Home School" in response

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to change user's existing school to existing International School, Home school, Manual School or send a request to customer service to review my school Info because of the school name is correct, but the address is incorrect. In order to Validate the End to End Testing of edit user's school information.
scenario.title: Renaming existing Domestic school to home school using SPS school services editor-8

Given.step: I want to change US domestic school to "home School" by the use of SPS school service editor

When.step: I initiate the Edit Domestic to Home School Service End Point

Then.step: the school is changed to home school
the response message for the action is shown

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Create, Update, Upgrade and Delete Consumer Profile, In order to Validate End to End Testing of SPS User Profile.
scenario.title: Upgrade consumer profile to teacher using sps user services

Given.step: I am Having SPS User Service to "Upgrade Consumer To Teacher"

When.step: I am Calling The Service End Point of Upgrade Consumer

Then.step: I should Have "Teacher Profile - Upgraded from Consumer" in response.

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Create, Update, Upgrade and Delete Consumer Profile, In order to Validate End to End Testing of SPS User Profile.
scenario.title: Upgrade consumer profile to teacher using sps user service-5

Given.step: sps user services are up and running

When.step: i am calling sps user upgrade services

Then.step: consumer profile is upgraded to teachers profile

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Create, Update, Upgrade and Delete Consumer Profile, In order to Validate End to End Testing of SPS User Profile.
scenario.title: Upgrade of consumer user profile to teacher user profile using sps user services-7

Given.step: I perform "Upgrade Consumer To Teacher" SPS User Service

When.step: The Service End Point of Upgrade Consumer has been issued

Then.step: upgrade to "Teacher Profile - Upgraded from Consumer" should occur as result

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Create, Update, Upgrade and Delete Consumer Profile, In order to Validate End to End Testing of SPS User Profile.
scenario.title: Update user information using user's profile page-6

Given.step: User profile information

When.step: I click a link update user profile

Then.step: I should receive a message "user information updated successfully" after editing user information

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Add Credit Card to Wallet, Update or Edit Credit Card Information, Get number of Credit Cards in the Wallet
scenario.title: Get the number of cards in wallet and its Info using sps wallet services

Given.step: I am Using SPS Wallet Service to "Get Crdit Card Info"

When.step: I am Calling the Get Credit Card Service End Point

Then.step: Should Get the "Credit Card Info from the Wallet" in response.

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Add Credit Card to Wallet, Update or Edit Credit Card Information, Get number of Credit Cards in the Wallet
scenario.title: retrieve number of cards in a wallet and their info using sps wallet services-5

Given.step: sps wallet services are up and running
i have right to access sps wallet services
i am authorised to view card and wallet details

When.step: i am calling sps wallet service

Then.step: a number of cards is displayed
information of each card is printed along with it

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Add Credit Card to Wallet, Update or Edit Credit Card Information, Get number of Credit Cards in the Wallet
scenario.title: The task to Get the number of cards in wallet and its Info using sps wallet services-7

Given.step: SPS Wallet Service is the choice used to "Get Crdit Card Info"

When.step: I am peforming the Get Credit Card Service End Point

Then.step: my reply should be "Credit Card Info from the Wallet"

scenario.feature: As QA Engineer I want to Add Credit Card to Wallet, Update or Edit Credit Card Information, Get number of Credit Cards in the Wallet
scenario.title: User cards details-6

Given.step: The link to user cards

When.step: I am requesting user cards

Then.step: I should receive the number cards and their details
